thread.title: All Smiles Dental offers free dental care event Oct. 22
thread.title_full: All Smiles Dental offers free dental care event Oct. 22

title: All Smiles Dental offers free dental care event Oct. 22
text: All Smiles Dental All Smiles Dental in Algonquin, 1452 Merchant Drive, hosts its third annual Dentistry From the Heart event, an initiative that is part of the worldwide nonprofit Dentistry From the Heart -- which is dedicated to providing free dental care to those in need. It will be 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. Thursday, Oct. 22. As part of this program, All Smiles Dental will open up the entire dental practice (all 12 operative rooms) for free to those in need of cleanings, fillings or dental extractions. Members of the community -- 18 years of age and older -- can come and receive as many treatments as they need -- no questions asked! Services will be offered on a first-come, first-serve basis. Registration begins at 7:30 a.m. For information, call (847) 854-7645 or visit www.allsmilesdental.com . Share this page
